summary: This is an email chain from June 12, 2020, forwarding a draft indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell and discussing logistics for her arrest. The email is sent among U.S. Attorney's Office personnel, indicating coordination on the case.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Addressed as a recipient in the forwarded email regarding the draft Maxwell indictment and arrest logistics.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the draft indictment being circulated, indicating imminent legal action against her.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is involved in the prosecution and indictment process against Maxwell.

events.title: Draft Maxwell Indictment Prepared
events.description: A draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell is completed and circulated among prosecutors.

events.title: Arrest Timeline Coordination
events.description: Prosecutors discuss scheduling a meeting to plan logistics for Maxwell's arrest.

keyFacts: A draft indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was circulated on June 11, 2020.
Prosecutors were coordinating arrest logistics for Maxwell in early June 2020.
The email indicates advanced planning by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York prior to Maxwell's arrest.
